Welcome to Pytero’s documentation!¶

Pytero is a flexible API wrapper for the Pterodactyl Game Panel in Python using async/await syntax and up-to-date typings for proper type-checker support.

Getting Started¶

  • Introduction

  • Examples

  • Advanced

Support¶

Feel free to join our Discord server or open an issue on the Github repo for support.
